song.title: This is Living
song.lyrics:
[Intro] . G A Bm Em
[1] .G A Waking up, knowing there's a reason .Bm Em All my dreams come alive . G A Life is for living with You . Bm Em I've made my decision .G A You lift me up, fill my eyes with wonder .Bm Em Forever young in Your love . G A This freedom's untainted with You . Bm Em No moment is wasted
[P] .G A See the sun now bursting through the clouds .Bm Em Black and white turns to colour all around .G A Bm All is new, in the Saviour I am found
[T] . G A Bm This is living now .Em G A Bm Em This is living now ---
[2] .G A You lead the way, God You're right beside me .Bm Em In Your love, I'm complete . G A There's nothing like living with You . Bm Em This life You created I choose
[C] . G A You take me higher than I've been before . Bm Em It's Your perfect love that sees me soar . G A Now Your freedom is an open door . Bm Em You are everything I want and more
[INSTRUMENTAL} .G A Bm Em
song.presentation: 1 P T 2 P T C P T C
